title: Belkin’s new Thunderbolt 4 dock offers a 12-port design, but with a hefty price tag
content:
If you have a Thunderbolt 4 compatible Mac, there is a growing number of docks and hubs available to expand your port choices. Belkin is the latest company to enter this category, officially announcing its new Connect Pro Thunderbolt 4 Dock. While it packs an impressive variety of ports, it comes with the .
